Package com.uzh.ase.dailygrind.postservice.post.service

Class PostService

java.lang.Object
com.uzh.ase.dailygrind.postservice.post.service.PostService
@Service public class PostService extends Object
Service layer responsible for handling business logic related to posts. It manages creation, updating, liking, pinning, and deleting posts.

      public PostService()

  • Method Details

    • createPost

      public PostDto createPost(PostDto postDto, String userId)
      Creates a new post for a user.
      Parameters:
      postDto - The data transfer object containing the post information.
      userId - The ID of the user creating the post.
      Returns:
      A PostDto containing the created post's details.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.web.server.ResponseStatusException - if the user already has a daily post.

    • addIsLikedAndIsPinnedToPostDto

      public PostDto addIsLikedAndIsPinnedToPostDto(PostEntity postEntity, String userId)
      Adds information about whether a post is liked or pinned by a user.
      Parameters:
      postEntity - The post entity to be transformed.
      userId - The ID of the user.
      Returns:
      A PostDto containing post details with like and pin status.

    • getPostsForUser

      public List<PostDto> getPostsForUser(String userId)
      Retrieves all posts for a given user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user whose posts are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of PostDto objects representing the user's posts.

    • getPostById

      public PostDto getPostById(String postId, String userId)
      Retrieves a post by its ID for a given user.
      Parameters:
      postId - The ID of the post.
      userId - The ID of the user requesting the post.
      Returns:
      A PostDto containing the post's details.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.web.server.ResponseStatusException - if the post is not found.

    • updatePost

      public PostDto updatePost(String postId, String userId, PostDto postDto)
      Updates a post's details.
      Parameters:
      postId - The ID of the post to be updated.
      userId - The ID of the user requesting the update.
      postDto - The data transfer object containing the updated post information.
      Returns:
      A PostDto containing the updated post's details.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.web.server.ResponseStatusException - if the post is not found.

    • deletePost

      public void deletePost(String postId, String userId)
      Deletes a post by its ID for a given user.
      Parameters:
      postId - The ID of the post to be deleted.
      userId - The ID of the user requesting the deletion.

    • findAllUsersWhoLikedPost

      public List<String> findAllUsersWhoLikedPost(String postId)
      Finds all users who liked a specific post.
      Parameters:
      postId - The ID of the post.
      Returns:
      A list of user IDs who liked the post.

    • likePost

      public void likePost(String postId, String userId)
      Likes a post for a given user.
      Parameters:
      postId - The ID of the post to be liked.
      userId - The ID of the user liking the post.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.web.server.ResponseStatusException - if the post is not found.

    • unlikePost

      public void unlikePost(String postId, String userId)
      Unlikes a post for a given user.
      Parameters:
      postId - The ID of the post to be unliked.
      userId - The ID of the user unliking the post.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.web.server.ResponseStatusException - if the post is not found.

    • getDailyPostForUser

      public PostDto getDailyPostForUser(String userId, String requestingUserId)
      Retrieves the daily post for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user whose daily post is to be retrieved.
      requestingUserId - The ID of the user making the request.
      Returns:
      A PostDto containing the daily post's details.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.web.server.ResponseStatusException - if the daily post is not found.

    • getPinnedPostsByUserId

      public List<PostDto> getPinnedPostsByUserId(String userId)
      Retrieves all pinned posts for a user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user whose pinned posts are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of PostDto objects representing the pinned posts.

    • pinPost

      public PostDto pinPost(String postId, String userId)
      Pins a post for a given user.
      Parameters:
      postId - The ID of the post to be pinned.
      userId - The ID of the user pinning the post.
      Returns:
      A PostDto containing the pinned post's details.
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if the post does not exist.

    • unpinPost

      public void unpinPost(String postId, String userId)
      Unpins a post for a given user.
      Parameters:
      postId - The ID of the post to be unpinned.
      userId - The ID of the user unpinning the post.
